Class MoistureController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread

        • marsbars.MoistureController

    public class MoistureController
extends Controller
    Controller responsible for the Soil Moisture Controller/Sensor functionality.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MoistureController

        public MoistureController(MoistureModel model,
                          MoistureView view)
        Contructor which takes the Soil Moisture model and GUI in order to pass values to and from the UI and processor
        Parameters:
        model - Soil Moisture model object. Calculations done by the Soil Moisture Sensor
        view - Soil Moisture view object. Responsible for importing the Soil Moisture sensor GUI into the controller.

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        public boolean setup()
        This method takes the initial soil moisture change rate values and refresh rate from the soil moisture GUI panel and passes them to the soil moisture model object for processing. This function is necesarry inorder to prevent the simulation from starting if the user has entered incorrect starting values.
        Returns:
        Whether all values were correctly loaded into each sensor or not.

      • run

        public void run()
        This method starts the thread in real simulation or simulation playback mode. It disables the necessary GUI elements given the simulation mode, reads data from a simulation file, or write simulation to a user specified file. It takes the user specified values of the greenhouse soil moisture and processing them at the user specified refresh rate.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread
